title: The Children
creator_credit: Department of Public Information of the United Nations
brief_description: This film describes the work of the United Nations International Children’s Emergency Fund. It shows how the drive for increased food production, the health programs and the educational activities of UNICEF are being carried out in many areas to provide a more hopeful world for tomorrow’s citizens.
